name: WordLink
0:
”Alexa open Word Link”
”Alexa play Word Link”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: word link
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is a part of Puzzle Games.

You will be given 5 clues, each clue has an answer and all the answers share one common link! For example. If the answers to the clues were: Red, Blue, Green, Orange, Black. The link would be… colours! If you get stuck on any of the clues you can say: “Hint”.

You get one shot at guessing the link, so don’t miss it!

If you launch this skill, it will tell you to open Puzzle Games.

Have Fun

HUGO FM
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
